titleStmt.title: Holy zeal against sin, shewn to be an acceptable and seasonable duty : in a sermon preached at Lyme Regis, in the County of Dorset, Sept. 4th. 1700. At a quarterly lecture appointed for the promoting the Reformation of Manners. / By J. E. Minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: J. E.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. H. for the author.,
